definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
short name for Hebei 河北 province/surname Ji

sentences.english: I almost wish we were butterflies and lived but three summer days.
sentences.chinese: 期冀你我化蝶生命仅有三个夏日。

sentences.english: Their spouses . It was all in the hopes of something better.
sentences.chinese: 这都是期冀能有更好的生活。

sentences.english: Hope and fear are the two greatest enemies of speculators.
sentences.chinese: 期冀和恐惧是投机者两个最大的敌人。

sentences.english: Hope and fear are the two greatest enemies of eculators.
sentences.chinese: 期冀和惧怕是投机者两个最大的敌人。

definition: to expect/to look forward to/anxious for sth/to hope (to get sth)
hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
to long for/to look forward to/longing/vision for the future
to long for/to crave for/to greatly desire
to hope/to wish/hope/wish/(old) name of an official post
